<title level="1" right="Hazard 7" pfs="">[Thunderstone Cascade Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=219)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 14</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A trip wire halfway up the stairs releases half a dozen spherical [thunderstones](/Equipment.aspx?ID=79) that bounce down the stairs and explode.

---

**Stealth**
DC 25 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 27 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (expert) to safely cut the trip wire

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 26, **Fort** +15, **Ref** +13

**Hardness**
0

**HP**
54

**Immunities**
critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Thunderstone Explosion** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The trip wire is disturbed; **Effect** Several thunderstones bounce down the stairs and explode. Each creature within 10 feet of the lower half of the stairs takes 6d10 sonic damage (DC 24 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). Creatures that fail this save are additionally [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1 minute; creatures that critically fail this save are instead deafened for 1 hour.
